constituent: feminine, Prince, this here, stop, footprint, spoon, sitting on the ground, turkey
heisigStory: This character for female forms a pair with that for male, which we will learn later (Frame 804). The elements: footprint . . . spoon . . . turkey.
koohiiStory2: To become feminine you must stop using a spoon to eat turkey and use a knife and fork like a proper lady.
myStory: giống cái. chim đậu vào thìa và dừng lại là con cái
